in_ports.name: contours
in_ports.hint: Existing contours: serialized array of several contours.

in_ports.name: table
in_ports.hint: Translation table: label L of each contour is replaced with  table[L] or table[L−1] (depending on "translate zero indexes").

controls.caption: Indexing base
controls.name: indexingBase
controls.description:
For every label L in the source array of contours, the result label after translation will be equal to
table[V−B], where B = this indexing base.
